Inside here, there are large bundles of food. There are big piles of rolled chain that have been coiled, and there is a hatch that leads into a downward slope. He goes over to it, opens the hatch, and goes, "All right, come on. Follow me," and heads down into the darkness.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We follow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I cast Light.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, the light emanates. The smell down here is

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you don't mind me asking, did you get a good look at it before you barricaded this entry point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No! I went in there and saw that that the-- well, one of my litters was being eaten, and then "it made a bunch of noises and then I ran."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You just heard it, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, I'm not going to-- you see what I have to work with!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Were the noises more squawks and shrieks? Or barks or growls?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Small, angry squeaks, and then a big growl."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Will you be coming with us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think we'll be just fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pop in, kill the thing, and then pop on out. Are any of them in there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Unfortunately, not in that one. The one on the right is where the litter's being raised "currently. The one in there, not doing too well." He bows his head sadly for a moment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's really sad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But hey, that's life in the wastes."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So you're just going to wait here on tippy-toe while we go in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah! Do I listen in?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Actually, we'd prefer to work in a little bit of silence. If you'll just wait for us up top, we'll take care of this lickety-split.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Okay, I accept your terms."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: See you soon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes over and pulls a key out of his pocket with his right foot, deftly unlocks one of the locks, pulls the chain off. "That's the big part. The rest of it is up to you." He scurries up the previous chamber and then up the slope and out of sight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Am I still a tiefling?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we prep?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've got about one minute left.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's it look like? What's it look like when I change? Can you see, like, a little bit of my features poking through? What happens?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, it just happens instantaneously.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Am I getting a little smaller? Oh, really?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to see-- wait! Can I look in your pants as it's happening?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking ridiculous.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as the Polymorph wears off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (counting down)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Describe it! Tell us! Does it just disappear? Does it (slurping)?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It reverts.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two, one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Happy New Year!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (slurp) There you go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was in the pool!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, for goodness sake!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was distracted, I was looking at the horns! I didn't even see.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I saw it! I saw it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, sorry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, Ducey. Why don't you come over here and put your ear on this wall and see if you can hear anything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check for me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. Ugh, that's terrible. 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's pretty quiet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Might be sleeping.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Take your ear away for a second? I'll go (boom) against the side of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now do you hear anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to say both of you guys make a perception check. You with disadvantage, based on the failure of the last roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Still hard for you to pick up a little bit against the door. You hear skittering.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. A fucking spider level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tiny squeaks, some scratching, more skittering. It's a ways away, a distant echo; and you're only barely able to make it up against the door.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, sounds like a bunch of little things. But he did say a bunch of little squeaks and then a roar, so maybe whatever the bigger thing is has something to clean up the scraps.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or it was the sound of one of the panther things dying.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Or perhaps we are talking about babies and mama? Hard to say.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe it's a spider, like a giant spider, that had a nest of baby spiders, so there's like a thousand little baby spiders and then one giant big one?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like spiders.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, let's go find out! Do we have a plan of attack?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it supported by poles?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are probably about 20 different poles, metal bars, pieces of heavy furniture leaned up against it. Whatever he and his goblin troupe were able to muster they pushed up against this door to ensure that whatever was in there did not come out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And it looks like it's been hitting against it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like some of the poles have been pushed into the ground a bit, and there's a slight gap at the top where the door looks like it's maybe pushed a little out of its hinges.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good deal, good deal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, actually, do you want to wait until we're in? Because it's a 60 second-- do you want to wait until we're in?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It only lasts for 60 seconds?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. So you want to wait until we're--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go in!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've got to go in now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right as we're going in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we start removing the poles.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Yasha helps you and it takes-- it doesn't take too long. Yasha's peeling them off the door and between the two of you and anybody else who wants to help you, you manage to get to a point where the door eventually (creaks) hangs open a little bit. The top and bottom hinges loose. The bottom breaks off entirely, and it opens up at an angle where now it's longways, occupying the same jamb where the door previously was.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, so instead of a thing, it's opened its hatch slightly?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's open and slid to one side, so now you can travel under or over it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's kind of at our advantage. If you wanted to, you could float some light down in that direction, or send in your little friend to take a look. I'm looking at you, Widogast.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, but we're running out of time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Time for what?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She has given her Blessing to some of us, and that is--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, right as we go in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She was just saying she was going to do it as we're going in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, okay. Oh, my cat. All right! Sending in Frumpkin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, roll a stealth check for Frumpkin.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good. Oh, but that's cat stealth, it's 18 plus-- where's my cat? 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, then roll a perception check for Frumpkin, please.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Frumpkin heads into the chamber. It is a rough, carved tunnel that descends into a subterranean cavern; maybe 50, 60 feet across before it comes to an end. It's not very wide, and it has a small opening towards the beginning, pinches a bit, and then curves around the side to end. It is damp, it smells awful, and as Frumpkin, stepping down into the first area, you can see bones scattered across the front area. Small bones, at least small for the creatures that were in here. They look human-sized in their tinier age, I guess. You see across one cluster, one mostly picked-clean body of what may have been a young moorbounder. Probably 30 or 40 large, crusty rats are clustered up over the body. Some of them are fighting for each other, squeaking at each other. Some are looking in the direction of the sound and the little bit of light that's peeking through from the door, that's now been pushed to the side, and the Light spell that Caduceus has been maintaining, and they're all pulling strips of flesh and whatever remnants they can from the bones and the corpse of one of these creatures.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: When you say large...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About that big each.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hold on, hold on. Looking through Frumpkin's eyes, I want Frumpkin to look at the ceiling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Frumpkin looks up at the ceiling, and there are a few rough bits of rock and stone that seem to have, either through ancient seismic activity, pushed through this cavern. While it was partially carved, there were some pieces of heavy stone that couldn't be carved, and as such they protrude and arc down a bit. Looking up, pressed between where these two stones are jutting out, there is some sort of a creature. No details to be seen, but a large creature that has currently pressed all of its limbs against the two sides of the rocks, and it's suspended looking down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All of its limbs?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (snarling) A little bit of saliva drips from above.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it very dark in there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's no light: pitch black.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I ask Frumpkin to slowly, slowly crouch down low to the ground and back out of the chamber.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (snarling) Backs out, backs out; and then manages to come back to the doorway, unnoticed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so there's a rat situation. That's one thing, a lot of rats. There is a big thing hanging from the ceiling, looking down at--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like a spider, or what?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, no. It was muscular; it looked maybe feline itself. It looks like it is watching the room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you send in one of your big balls of fire?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Straight up to the ceiling or something?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I do not have that ready today because I thought we would do a little more talking in the city.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a bummer.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Big bummer.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have some oil.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got some thoughts.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (excited gasp) Fluffernutter!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could do something like Fluffernutter.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you think we could make Fireline work here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fireline? Wall of Fire?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hmm.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I would have to run in, though.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We could tailor it. We could have Frumpkin do it and keep you safe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Frumpkin can't carry a bottle of oil.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's true, that's true. What will you do when you get there, though?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Keep running. Hide.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You need to peel away. You need to get up to that point, douse them, and peel away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or we throw in some black powder, and you shoot it! Fluffernutter!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fluffernutter! I don't have any black powder.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What the fuck?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have a big jar of burning oil, but that's similar. Similar!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have a thing we have done before. We could do it now. We could try it. Better than running in. Want to give it a go?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. You've been in there, visually. How far from the entrance is the creature?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was about midway into the chamber, and the chamber went back about 60 or so. So 30, 35.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe I can use Mage Hand to carry in--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's even better.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What if we could convince this thing to be a steed? I could try to go in and talk to it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You mean tame the beast?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if it's intelligent? What if it's a human thing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That would be unfortunate.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have not known a lot of positive instances of getting a wild animal to be all right with domestication.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I like this idea because that thing is not looking for a vial or a jar of anything floating through the air. We could drag it along. Then, like you're cooking, you're seasoning your food, you could douse the rats.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Go all over the room with it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Straight line to the rats, then juice the rats. Then (explosion).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm juicing the rats? I'm not juicing the guy up top?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have no way to reach the guy up top.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I'll juice the rats.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You juice-a the rats-a!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll juice-a the rats!

lines.name: LIAM, TRAVIS
lines.text: You like-a the juice?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a fresh SNL skit from 1980-something.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Only the freshest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He'll get you more juice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to try something. A set play.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. In this moment of intense quiet, as you gather your supplies to prepare for your plan, you take a deep breath. We'll come back at this moment.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I knew it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We can take a break now and then jump into whatever this is going to be when we return. We'll be back here in a little bit. We're going to take a short break, folks. We do have our fantastic Wyrmwood giveaway tonight.

lines.name: TRAVIS, TALIESIN
lines.text: Wyrmwood!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's so pretty. I'm going to mispronounce the shit out of this. Padauk? Pad-ock?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's beautiful. It's orange.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Congratulations! We'll get you your brand new spanking Wyrmwood dice box ASAP.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're giving out spankings?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You should be so lucky. As you guys begin to prepare yourselves to enter this chamber--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yee-haw, Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yee-haw, Sam.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Y'all come back now, you hear?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm so happy!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Best idea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's the best. For you guys, to try and ascertain what your setup is as you head into this chamber, I would like you guys to figure out what your placement is. If we're at this point here, who's going in first?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nott is right at the door because we're going to try to pull some shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would be right at the entrance way, there. Caleb, you're at the front?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I will go to the other side of that chamber, that hallway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's good. I am preparing a Fire Bolt to launch at the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three steps back, so we'll put you--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's perfect. What is going on?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Travis threw food in my mouth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's Caleb and Nott. Where is everyone else going?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'd like to be towards the back, but not at the back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There, maybe?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did everybody roll initiative?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not yet. Combat has not yet begun.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who do we want in front? We should probably put Yasha towards the front, I imagine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'd like to be up near the front as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll put Yasha behind here, and Fjord there, in front of Caleb.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess I'll be next to Caleb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll be behind Caleb or near Caleb. Yeah, that works.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you keeping your blink dog at bay?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's going to sit outside for this one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nugget curls back into the exit portion of the chamber and (whines).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't make any noise. I don't know if he understands me. He's real cute.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He sits there looking at you expectantly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You still have a ferret around your neck?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But a goth ferret!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A gerret. Mighty Nein, what would you like to do? From as far as Frumpkin could see from how far Frumpkin went into the chamber, that was as far as it went. That's all you know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The rats were whereabouts?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's our only play at the moment.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to attempt something. It's definitely going to work and kill everything in there in one move! Watch and learn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sounds confident.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It will flush things out. Here we go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (yelling) Fireline! (normal voice) I don't yell that. I don't yell Fireline. I whisper: Fireline! I cast Mage Hand. I take my purified pot of burning oil. I had purified some alchemist oil before. With the Mage Hand, starting maybe ten feet from where we are, the hand is going to start pouring it out slowly as it carries it down in a line.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) It can get--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If I need to, I'll step in--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may have to step in a little closer for the 30-foot range of Mage Hand. That's about as far as you need.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to step in closer, then, behind Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to douse the rats, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Straight line up to the rats, and then season them like you're cooking pasta.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can Nugget fight?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nugget can. Nugget can also die. It's up to you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let Nugget fight!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just to let you know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good to know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: God forbid.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stop it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some things never change.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Going to make a line towards the rats. Then when it gets around the rats, a bunch of figure eights all over the rats, all around. When it seems like it's out, I'm going to (clicks tongue) to Caleb and say: Fireline!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear it scattering across the floor of the stone interior cavern, splattering and droplets hitting the stone. As it pours out, some of the rats (hissing) towards the sound. They have a darkvision of 30 feet, so they see you, Nott. You see in a second, all of a sudden, about 14 pairs of eyes suddenly glow as what little bit of light is peeking from the tunnel, behind where Caduceus has had the spell out, catches the back of their retinas. They all gleam in your direction, and then a few more. There's a large cluster of rats over there. Now, I need everyone to roll initiative.

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The oil has just reached them and is now pouring over them. They've noticed Nott, and they're starting to scatter as the oil spills in their direction.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is terrible.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is true.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we still blessed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are blessed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does that count for initiative?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha rolled a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, you're 18?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 to ten?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten to five?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Six. Clerics at the end are nice because I can undo anything terrible that happened.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good. Clean up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Top of the round, as soon as you hear the cluster of hisses and shifting of darkened rat bodies in the shadow across the way-- because most of you have darkvision. Those who don't, there's limited light in here. You cannot see really beyond the threshold of this chamber. Jester, you are first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do they know that we're here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The rats do, but that's about it. You're way in the back, so you might not even see what's going on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Prepare something?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck it. I'm going to do it. I'm going to throw Daylight into the chamber.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the range on it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 60 feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to put it right on the top of that little--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rats (snarling).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's why I did it; I thought they wouldn't like light.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, there you go. That's your action.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Yeah, and I already did a spell, so I can't do my bonus. Yeah, that's going to be my move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're going to stay where you are?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester stays there. Next up on that is Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With the light being cast, do I see the thing that was on the ceiling?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is this my action to perceive?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is a quick glance upwards. The Daylight's going to make it a little--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do not. The ceiling itself comes to a pinch point where a lot of the stones were jutting down and creating this-- what would normally be a 15-foot-high ceiling comes down to about ten feet, where a lot of these rock shapes are jutting out from the sides and the ceiling. You do not see the creature that was mentioned by Caleb.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A reverse crevasse in the ceiling?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll move forward and to my right, into that little jut-out area there, or maybe where-- I'm looking for a place to hide, so either that jutted-out area there--

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If there's a hiding spot where your finger is right now, that would be great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There might be, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I'll go there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five, ten, 15, 20. You at least can get behind the series of natural stone and rock formations that cluster on that side of the wall.

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, ready to shoot it when it appears?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go it. That ends your turn, Nott. It is Yasha's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. At the end of that turn, you hear (snarling). Leaping from that ceiling portion down towards where Yasha is, you see a massive beast entity. You can see patches of fur and robust ribs that are pushing against very tightly-pulled skin. It looks like it's starved or itself gaunt and skeletal in nature, but it is probably about ten feet from front to back. As it leaps down towards her, it attempts to make a multiattack on Yasha.

A long tail. A hooked, curved tail.

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.text: Only three people are blessed.

lines.text: Yeah, it's only three blessed right now.

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Close, but no cigar.

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: On him. He's going to be in the middle of it, and they're going to take a bite.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where are we? Here is my blightstaff, and I have to go to creatures so I can figure out how to do this. That's an attack-- there's my bite. That's a 15?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15, that hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's get a few d4s here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't trust Matt right now. 15 hits the thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Not everything has huge armor classes, Travis.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't even talk to me. Mm-mm. That's a deep-ass cave. This ain't done.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's terrible. Three, five-- that's seven points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven points of damage? All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's irritated.

lines.text: He is. The beetles are climbing and biting in various parts of-- the patchy hair and fur across its body already has exposed bits of dull gray and liver-spotted exposed portions that the beetles are all climbing onto, and clinging, and carving bits out. It shakes them off best it can.

lines.text: How much did you heal Yasha?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I couldn't. That was why I didn't say.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha looks at you, disappointed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That your turn?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, that's the end of my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Six seconds ago, it was just Caleb and Nott standing on that little ledge, and Caleb was starting to swirl a little bit of fire in his hand. Then fucking pandemonium broke out, so Caleb just watched and went: Oh, oh, oh. The ball goes (flame sputtering) from his hand and hits the oil on the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (fire roaring) That's going to be against the-- yeah, the oil on the ground. Those rats, those rats, the guy, and the beetles all suffer the flame explosion as it burns across. It's a dexterity saving throw for each of them. For the rats-- strangely, yeah! They made a 15, so they manage to only take--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wait, they take a d4 negative to that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is five points of fire damage to that rat swarm. The other one-- no, they fail. That is another five points of fire damage to that rat swarm. The beetles--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The creature, natural 19 plus one, 20. It makes the save, so it takes no damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will finish this turn-- Caleb backs out of the room going: Oh, oh, oh. Walks back and stands next to Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hi!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, we look alike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. That finishes your turn. Jester, you're up first.

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where you putting it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At fucking 4th-level.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to put it right above the dude. That's my bonus action, so I'm going to try to hit it. 14?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just misses.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Balls, yay. I'm going to cast Toll the Dead as my action at the guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a wisdom save?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cool. That was a really fun turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Some days, man.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: End of Jester's turn. Nott, you're up-- unless you want to move? You're good?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: MARISHA, LAURA
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: As it's currently being assaulted by a cluster of beetles biting into its side, flames burst from underneath it. Yasha and it are both clashing with jaw and blade. (yowl) In its hindquarters, the bolt slips in there. You watch the tail suddenly, instinctively pulse and reflexively tense itself from the pain that it's now suffering from the impact.

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure! 37 points of damage on one hit. Not too bad. That's your turn. Yasha's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) 40. She'll get right there to try and grapple its tail. The rats do get an attack of opportunity on her. No, not with the minus four from the Bane. She moves around. Make an athletics check for her. Because she's raging, she does have advantage on it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She manages to grapple the creature, and she's holding the tail. It's grappled. It can't move. It can still strike with it. Its eyes go wide as the blood lust kicks in, and it turns towards you and lashes out again. You bring up your staff to try and deflect it, but the jaws reach out and push it to your chest and clamp down on your shoulder and chest. You pull yourself forward. The pain-- both the crushing pressure of its jaws and the teeth sinking into your torso-- is astronomical. As it has you there, it's tail goes toward the back.

The control over your body and your organs and the systems within you gaining as you continue to grow in experience and world understanding. You concentrate for a second and the poison actually ejects from the wound. The muscles itself not allowing it to enter your bloodstream.
