lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not dead yet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just watch him as I get healed by Caduceus.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nugget! Come in here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (panting, poof) Just teleports, blinks to you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, get a critical hit for Nugget and dispatch the demon dog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have Nugget finish off the demon dog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, the unconscious one?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Uh-huh. Let it taste blood.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 21 healing points to anybody who wants them.

lines.name: TRAVIS, SAM, LIAM, MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's make sure. How many people are taking that? One, two, three, four, and I will be five. Cool. You were good?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we try to wake this fiendish thing and tame it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we just kill it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's very almost dead, whatever it is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nugget, bite him! Don't bite him; you're too sweet. Don't bite anything. Here, have some candy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He gets down and starts tearing the candy apart on the ground. Nugget's not full-grown at this point. He's still a puppy, but a big puppy, getting to about that size, and not really knowing the full size of the animal, you're already like, "Oh, this is going to be a big boy."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What did you just feed him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Candy!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What kind?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want some? I have peppermints, I have some cherry suckers, and I have--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just not chocolate, yeah?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No chocolate.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take the falchion and stick it in the back of the neck of the demon dog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It exhales its final breath and goes still.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mister Caleb, maybe we should take a look around and see where these things came from.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good idea. I will join you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Either two of you make investigation checks, or one person does with advantage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Investigation at advantage because someone's helping me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will do an investigation check as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, both of you guys take one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A million.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 and a million.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! You guys move along, stepping over the corpses of the two creatures. The rotting-flesh smell that you smelled when you first came into the chamber, when you get close to these creatures-- now that the adrenaline has worn off and you can actually take a moment to process all the senses-- this very molded-citrus-type, acrid smell emanates from their bodies along with long-rotted flesh. It is an awful smell from these creatures. In ways, parts of them remind you of hyena-dogs with these large ridges along the back of the spine, the tail extremely venomous. You guys move past and head around the other corner. You pass by other bones and other corpses of what were smaller moorbounders, pups that were being trained or risen and fed, and in the back corner, Nott, you see it first and Caleb just seconds after, there is this faint glow, this very faint red glow. It looks like a crack in the stone. You approach and look at it, and as soon as you look at a side angle, the crack isn't on the stone; it's about an inch away from it. It's in the air, and it's about two feet across, like that, and about an inch sliver.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we stick our hands through there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, we should not do that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's what I'm for.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, this is where the problem is coming from. I'm not sure what to do about it, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can we seal it? Can we un-magic it? Yasha! Yasha, you have-- Oh, do you have a dispel?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jester!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to try to Dispel Magic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make a wisdom check. Roll a d20 and add your wisdom modifier.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 15 plus eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus your wisdom modifier.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry, 15 plus five.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 is the DC you needed. As Jester steps forward, you see through the crack. It begins to slowly widen, and for a split second as she's concentrating and focusing, for a split second beyond that there's red and purple and you hear this faint swirling of wind and screams and who knows beyond the veil, and you can see another one of those creatures starting to come up and sniff the other side of this rift, and right as it looks through, its eye peeking out from the other side, it seals and is gone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You did it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was amazing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good, because I don't know if we could have fought another one of those guys, you know? We totally could have taken another one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We need to convince our goblin friend upstairs that we have performed some form of exorcism on top of the killing part, so hopefully we get a better deal, even.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, where did that rift even go?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, it feels like some sort of fiendish enemies that we were fighting, so I'm assuming the Nine Hells?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Have you not read of the Hells?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Would I know where those things might have come from?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can either make an arcana or maybe a religion check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll do the religion because I've read about rel-- okay, 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fiendish, definitely. Not devil.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Which is Nine Hells.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So this is abyssal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is abyssal. The chaotic nature of its form, the little glimpse beyond that you saw, and the general smell that remains after it, is less of the essence of brimstone and other such smells that seem to accompany rifts or doorways that lead to the Nine Hells, and instead the smell here is something else entirely. Based on all these things together, you're pretty certain that this was an abyssal creature.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You share that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Abyssal dogs.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Was the rift just large enough for a creature like that to come through, or was it larger?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looked at the moment like a creature that size could maybe squeeze through, but you also saw it begin to expand as the creature began to draw near. So it may have had some level of flexibility.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So not like something else came through before.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well I mean, I don't know. These things could happen.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I walk over to the first demon dog, and I'll take the falchion and cut the stinger off the tail, and hand it over to Caduceus and go: Shouldn't we maybe hold onto these for something?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would talk to Nott about that. It's not a terrible idea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really venomous and poisonous. Paralytics and all?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should give the other one to Yasha.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to see if the spores will take in these things or not. I don't know if they will.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The fiendish nature is resistant to the spores, but not immune. Meaning you're used to your Decomposition being rather rapid. It is beginning, but it is a slower process.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's interesting. That's very interesting.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know, this is interesting, because when I was at your library, one of the many things that I discovered there that day is that-- Do you want to finish talking?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Continue.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That the empire here, the Kryn Dynasty, there was mention of Tharizdun.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ter-is-doom?

lines.name: LIAM, MARISHA
lines.text: Tharizdun.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is that? Is that a place?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And we find this here, just this close to the surface? Maybe it's coincidence. Maybe not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To clarify, just because you would know, the research that you uncovered deals in drow cultures and what's written on them. There are connections to Tharizdun, and a madness that is known to have claimed much of the Tal'Dorei drow and the Underdark that resides there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tal'Dorei drow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. But there is speculation within imperial books and research that perhaps the same madness is also spreading in the east.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hmm. Okay. Well, Caleb would not have understood everything that he found that day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. No, it's true. Just letting you know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I see if there's any poison I can extract from these stingers? With my expert medicine checks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, go ahead and make a medicine or nature check on this, I'd say. Your choice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Want me to help you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I help him? Because I got proficiency in medicine. I know what I'm doing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll look for the chemicals, you look for the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The veins.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The veins, you look for the veins.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Natural 20. Should I roll again?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, that's it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wouldn't it be amazing if it was two natural 20s, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyway, it takes you a little bit of time and you manage to extract-- unfortunately, due to the state of its body, once it dies, the toxin begins to separate and suffuse its own flesh and system. But you do manage to extract a vial of its venom.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Some vicious shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's paralysis venom, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Possibly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That could be mean.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Poisoned and paralytic.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like how big of a vial? Like a skinny kind?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like a single application.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One run.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's smaller than those; it's about that big. Because it has to be purified element. It's good for one application, whether that be weapon, or imbibed, or whatever the case may be.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Killer app.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But with the natural 20, you also know that's probably weeks, if not months away. But there is an eventual shelf life on its potency.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Should you use it now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just jabs Caleb.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, we've successfully cleared the demons. This cave is clear.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should disguise ourselves again before we go back up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that's a good call.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to look a little different no matter what because I can only do that once a day, but that's okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's all right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll just make you look kind of dirty and stuff. I start rubbing dirt all over Caduceus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This stuff is-- not this dirt. This is weird dirt.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you want your horns and dick again?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, I start waving the caterpillar cocoon in front of her face and give her a wang.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (coughing) That's dusty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You reclaim your respective illusions and/or transformations.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (bulking up noises)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Perfect.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) Macy's Day float over here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (lower pitched) 'Sup?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You ascend back into Zorth's Pits. As you make your way up towards the top, the trap door is actually closed. As you go to open it, it is currently locked.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, goddamn it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (knocks)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Is it you?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, it's us. What, you think they talk or something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know about these things! Just being safe, come on."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Open the door!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, just hold on a second." (multiple locks clicking) You hear chains being pulled. Eventually it gets pushed open and he's kicked the lid of it open. The actual doorway falls back and leans against the wall. He looks down. "So is it done?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh god, there's another one! Run!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (screams)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nah, I'm just kidding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Tricksy orc."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, come on up. So what was it? What'd you do? What'd you kill? Was it done? Are "you sure? What proof you got?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Actually, we left them down there for you if you're interested in, I don't know, harvesting pieces of-- what was it, demon creatures?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fiends, for sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks you over real close and goes, "I don't know why, but I believe you. Okay, I'll go "down and take a look. Just checking, didn't know if it was some sort of a pull one over on me and "take my business, so I'm just being careful."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you want to go look right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, but you should know that you had a portal to another dimension in your cave.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I had to close it. It was not pretty, but you should be careful, because if it opens again, what are you going to do, you know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (quietly) "That's not good."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you know why it happened? Have you ever seen that kind of thing before?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah have you heard of something similar happening?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He lifts one foot up and scratches the edge of his temple and goes. "No, I haven't. That's pretty dangerous, isn't it?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Would you guys let the Lady know maybe?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Lady?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Lady. If this sort of stuff's happening, that's very not good."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, Zethriss--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Zethriss Oreos?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that would be the neighborly thing to do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's her name? Zethriss?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Lady Olios."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Olios.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Olios. I haven't met her. Otherwise I'd tell her myself, but you know... I don't know, "them drow folk make me feel sort of self-conscious, you know?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's surprising. You're very impressive. I mean, I'm certainly charmed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a-- your choice, persuasion or deception.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, persuasion. 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, stop. Oh, you're adorable."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well done! Great! Fantastic! Let me go look at it!" He goes down and runs in the darkness below and you hear, (shouting) "Ah, god! Ah, another one! Jeez, how many were there?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There were three, but one of them is gone because he was banished.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could lock him there and just take all--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey, hey, hey. We're making friends now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's amazing! You killed three of them! Fantastic."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Additionally, there was a rift in the very fabric of time and space down below and my sister here closed that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's amazing!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So if you want to give us even more of a discount because, you know, we saved you a lot trouble in the future--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We had a deal, no. But that's amazing!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You also had a serious rat infestation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I know about the rats! I mean, that's half what you feed these things."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, sorry, then.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, we did not agree to close any kind of rift to another dimension.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, no, and that's so appreciative of me!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would hate for us to open it back up. So since it was something outside of the deal we made--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then maybe you should go talk to the Lady and tell her the good deed you did, and maybe "she'll be, 'Thank you! You went and close a rift for the town! Here's some money!'"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's get these steeds and move on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm a very kind person. I don't mind closing rifts for people in need, you know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's wonderful."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Will you at least hold on to the jag-- the moorbound-- the swamp kitties for a little bit longer while we go talk to Lady Zethriss?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, I've still got to train you."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean, I'm not just going to hand them over. That's a recipe for disaster."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. How'd you lose your arms? Was it also in one of your seminars?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You know, when you're learning how to work with these things, if you're not careful, bad "things happen. But you learn. Twice. But you know, hasn't slowed me down!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I guess you can still straddle a swamp kitty. All right, let's go!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to go see this woman?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think this is an opportunity. To be good neighbors. We're going to maybe need a few friends while we're out here, so let's try not to be criminals and a criminal element too much.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it the kind of thing that we can do in under an hour, or perhaps would wait until tomorrow?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're close by, right? It's that spire over there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, yeah. That's maybe 12 minutes from here, tops."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I say it's worth it, personally.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe she takes appointments.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I mean, when we get there, she may not even be home.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When are we going to be in the City of Beasts again?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At least let's file a report, like proper citizens.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll be back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "See which ones are the most spry and lively."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get one that's really cute for me, okay? Like, gothy, but cute at the same time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "For you? I'll do my best!" (giggles) He escorts you guys to the outside of Zorth's Pits, closes the door behind you guys and you're now standing in the center of the main street thoroughfare.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's head that way. It's always worth making friends, no matter where you are.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you think she's a mage or sorcerer or something?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have no idea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They keep calling her Lady and she lives in a tower.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, listen, if y'all are worried those of us that are under minimal changes-- we could let her know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fjord, yours is pretty major.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It is, isn't it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I hadn't noticed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You two don't need to do much of anything, do you? You should talk to her, in case she's able to see through things.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I imagine that anybody who lives in this city will understand the desire to be incognito.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I do not make that assumption, I would like the horny one and the little green lady to talk to her, if that's okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Beau and Nott? Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was for you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I liked it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Makes sense.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just precautions.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're on it. We have this totally handled.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I believe in you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Is everyone going as a group?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll walk over there as a group, but the detectives will go in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Reminds you of harpoons, a bit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are these human catchers? People catchers?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm trying to remember the name. There's a name, and it's somewhere in my brain right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Spikes with a loop, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not entirely certain. Actually, you, being the learned one, make an intelligence check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just straight intelligence? That was almost fucking awesome. It's still okay. 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not entirely certain the application of these, but these are a different type of ballista ammunition.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Interesting. Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They don't know, but I did remember the term.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They step aside. They don't take note of you, but they move on, and both of them split as they reach the center road and go in two different directions, heading north and south. What would you like to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we should go right in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're just going to go in. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two of you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. Wait out here, y'all.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thanks for saving my life.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys patiently wait, the investigatory team, you step to the base of the building, and up what's maybe five feet of stairs, these wide, 15-foot wide stone stairs that lead to the main open doorway. Stepping into the initial chamber, the light that fills the inside, it's beautiful. It's warmer on the inside, and there's no desk, more than a set of chairs-- comfortable, well-made chairs, once again standing out against most of the furniture and the living spaces you've already encountered, even in cursory glances across the city. As you enter the chamber and look around, there are two doors, one to the right and one to the left. They are both closed, and there does not appear to be anybody in the chamber at the moment.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Knock on some doors? Or is there a bell?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we see anybody?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You both look and, to each side of the door, there is a braided cord that hangs about ten feet from a bell, flanking each side of the door on the inside.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's two different doors, two different bells?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shall we just ring them both?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Any markings on--? (ringing) (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Amazing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A moment passes before one door opens up and, stepping inside, you see a human, a man probably in his mid-forties or so, big, bushy beard that falls down to his mid-chest, hair that is greased and slicked back into very tight ponytail that then releases into a bunch of billowing curls that go to about his mid-back. He is wearing dark gray-silver robes and bright, shiny, little pins that mark where the clavicle and the shoulder meet. As he peeks through and goes, "Can I help you?", the other door opens, and you see a drow girl, young, maybe late teens, early twenties. Bright silver-white hair that is pulled into a high ponytail and then two tendrils that go past the front of the ears and dangle down to about mid-chest. Beautiful, solid gray-blue skin, almost amber-colored eyes, as she peeks through wearing a similar robe as to him, and goes, "Hello?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're looking for Lady Zethriss. Is one of you-- I don't want to presume.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The man closes the door, and the girl walks up. "If I might ask, what is the reason for the meet?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Sunbreaker told us to come over here, because he said maybe that you guys had some work for us, but at the same time, we were supposed to come tell you about this stuff that we found here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're an investigative duo. We're known as Django and Nash, and we go around finding things--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really important things.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We found something that you might be interested in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Please wait patiently. I will let the Lady know."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, you're not the Lady.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No." Closes the door.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good pitch.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I thought she was a lady. She

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. We're going to tell them of the rift, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If it suits our purposes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What else are we going to tell them?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know, honestly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually the door opens, and she returns and goes, "Please, if you would not mind, "come with me."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. Yes, of course. We do this sort of thing all the time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure, yeah, yeah, yeah. Insight check!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have you ever killed one-half of a table before, Matt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! Oh! I'm going to die! We're going to die! She's a monster in a girl's shell!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Guys, D&D Beyond has a ferocious race for president of D&D heating up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You follow suit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go past the third door, and the woman goes and opens the chamber doorway, nods, and gives you a nudge to enter.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You enter the room. The first thing you're met with is two drow warriors, both adorned in armor, but the armor itself is clean, well-kept, possibly ceremonial, or at least has not been used in battle for a while. They both look at you both and step aside. Beyond that, you see a beautiful, tall, high-back lounge chair that extends out with this deep reddish-purple hue, like a velvet. The rim on the outside that curls around it, also beautifully done in a brass color that spirals on the edges. You can see a small altar in the center of the chamber, about three feet from the foot of this, and this altar heads up in this slow, gradual, spiralling point, almost like there were two paths of a tapering tower. At the top, you see a brass dodecahedron.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I look everywhere but at that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hollow, there's nothing inside, but it's an art piece. In the chair, sitting in incredible, detailed brocades inlaid into this silk robe that drifts past her legs to the point where you cannot see her feet, dangling and rolling off the edge of the chair, this beautiful dark elf woman, her skin a soft violet hue, her hair bright white that seems to taper to a similar purple-violet color as to her skin as it goes past her shoulders. Her hair is long. It goes past her hips, and tumbles off the edges of the chair. She sits towards the edge of the chair, just looking her face towards this art piece, her eyes closed, and her hand raises up and asks you to enter, silently.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll just wait until she talks, I guess?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. She'll start the convo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She gestures for you.

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, we'll do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two Kryn soldiers close the door and stay there, watching. They're not leaving you alone in the chamber. Her eyes open and look toward you, and her irises are a pure, vibrant amethyst purple. It's entrancing, even just to see the color. Even in this low light, it almost seems to be backlit, the way the color comes at you. Her face seems gentle and comes to a smile. "So I have "been told that you are investigators. Is this correct?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, we're detectives.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You came at the behest of the Sunbreaker?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He told us about you. He didn't say, "You must go there."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But he was like, "You should probably go see her because she's pretty cool," and he wasn't lying, man! You are super cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right. Well, are you coming seeking work?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe. We were interested in possibly sharing some information with you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We found something that I think you would like to know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Please, do tell me."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to tell her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We like to keep our client list private. But we were on another case and we stumbled upon a bit of a rifty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it was like, you know, like a--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A doorway to another dimension.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was very flexible. It was another dimension.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It could expand to accept any shape that wanted to enter it, but that wasn't the interesting part.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no, that was normal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The interesting part was that this passageway let in creatures from another dimension. An evil dimension. Some call it the Abyss, or something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They were definitely fiends, you know, that came through. There were multiple ones and they were scary.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Right in your home town here!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They were right here! Under the ground!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A few hundred yards away from here! We were like, "That's crazy." But right away, we were like, "We got to go tell Lady Z."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The true difficulty is our resources are focused "to the west. We have found too many close incursions across the Ashkeepers and we are "waylaid left and right. So it is fortunate you have come to me because I have much interest in "talented minds. Especially those who are looking to work for coin or trade."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, coin is pretty cool and stuff, and so is some trade.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "May I ask you, what are your specialities, the two of you?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm really good at healing people and stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is good."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I can also, you know-- I make a duplicate of myself. I can also do that!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's a talented artist.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I draw. I could draw a portrait for you, if you want me to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A tattoo artist-- budding.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can be of service.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, these skills-- those would be at the end of the resume, like special skills. I think that--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Horseback riding.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like driving stick shift.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Has driver's license. But I think the one she wanted to lead with was, she's a healer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm a healer, but I'm also, like, a badass healer. You know, so I can hit things and heal at the same time. And then

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fast as lightning.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, that's lower. That's lower on the CV, high tolerance. Fast as lightning, sneaky as a motherfuck!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And! And!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sharpshooter. (crossbow bolts whizzing)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Super, super good with arrows and bolts and stuff.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: we're a dynamic duo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But she says, "Well. And you have-- this rift that you mentioned. These fiendish things, did you just discover them? Or have you dealt with them?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, we dealt with them! They are dead and gone and (snaps) banished and also the rift is closed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And it's just the two of you?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have some coworkers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Some other people that work with us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your choice.

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: Both of us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Woo!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dueling 18s!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 22 for me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is it, deception or persuasion?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Persuasion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just straight 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! Interestingly enough, that impatience and hardness that has been growing subsides. She began to lean forward in kind of an, "I'm going to deconstruct these people," type of energy; something that you've encountered before. And then a few things you said, and the way that you explained it away, she began to feel a little more comfortable. "Well, we can use all the help we can "get. There are two things that come to mind at the moment, if you are interested in helping. For one, "I have come to believe there is an Empire spy in our midst, living here, in Asarius. Possibly, if my "information is correct, working or staying near the Four Corners. An intercepted missive out of the "city from this individual was shot down, being sent by nighthawk. And the messenger was seen leaving "the Four Corners. This missive was giving information about the movement of our forces, preparations "and such, to the Empire. It was being sent to Bladegarden. If you can suss out this spy and turn "them in to me, you will be rewarded greatly. Bring them alive, I'll leave you with 5,000 gold pieces." (gasping)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm so broke; we're so broke.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And I have suspicions that it is connected with this demonic presence. (sigh) Focusing on the war "efforts, I am unable to allocate many resources to this, so you would be of great help. If you could "find the root of this corruption, wherever it stems from, and snuff it out, freeing Asarius "from this infernal influence, the Dynasty is willing to pay 10,000 gold pieces."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a good amount of money.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mm-hmm, that's good. Money is good, money is good. We--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If money is not interesting to you, we could always trade with favor to the Bright Queen."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is actually, possibly even more appealing than money, maybe?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) Who's the Bright Queen?

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: (whispers and confused muttering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We may have need of that. There is an ally of ours who we've been trying to ascertain their whereabouts, and maybe through favor, you could help us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She leans forward and goes, "Are either of you consecuted?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Consecuted?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Understood."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've never heard that word before. Is that a made-up word? Is that a Scrabble word?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She got all she wanted from that. She goes, "Well, if you seek the Bright Queen's favor, I "just assumed you were perhaps of the houses of Ghor Dranas. My apologies. But the coin remains, "and perhaps a favor or a trade. But these are conversations to have when you have succeeded."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right. Do you know where we would start with the stuff, and stuff?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The demons, the demonic presence, any leads? Any hot tips?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is precisely why we would be hiring an investigator."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, we know that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we know where to start because, you know what, we just came from something so we'll just follow that trail.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Totally.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I look forward to the completion of any or all of your missions."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So do we.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "May the light be with you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And also with you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The door opens behind, the soldiers are holding the door and kind of looking at you expectantly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Well, we should go then.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. See you soon, then.

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: Bye!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Bye." You guys are quickly escorted back outside of the hall. As you guys are sitting there waiting nervously for a while, eventually you see two Kryn warriors gently nudging both Nott and Jester outside.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As we left, I just quickly rang the other one one more time and just kept going out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear, "Hello?", as you just walk away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. So you sent in the right people for that job!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (ptchoo, ptchoo, ptchoo!)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have two assignments that have nothing to do with saving my husband. But maybe if we did one, she might be able to help us. Maybe?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a hard one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. Here's the thing: we have these three beasts now. We could go charging across the badlands to Ghor Dranas, right? And search around for my husband, which I really want to do; don't get me wrong.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Unless that minotaur's around.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (exhales) I mean, did you see his pecs? They were not fake, like yours. Anyway. We could do that, but it's a lot of unknowns, right? This lady could give us... something. I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did she sound connected with Ghor Dranas?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, yeah. I mean, she's high up here, you know. So she could definitely get some shit done.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She said that she could curry favor with the Bright Queen?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which is the queen!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that the queen?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They have an Empress here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what I'm talking about. It's her!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't understand all the terminology, but she is referred to as a word: an umavi? I don't know what that is, but I noticed that your boyfriend said he was--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He said, "I'm almost an umavi ascended" or something like that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A near-umavi ascension?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Umavi, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So she's called

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think she's called

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Something about umavi, for sure, though.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It refers to the Empress, Leylas Kryn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have you ever heard the term "consecuted"?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's not a word, is it...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, it doesn't seem like the word. But she said--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She said that it sounded like it had something to do with the high up houses or something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. Are you consecuted?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm pretty sure consecuted means you're of a royal or a proper family? Would I know that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a history check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I might know that, too. I feel like that might be in my wheelhouse.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Make a history check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. That's a one minus one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not great for me, either: eight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've got this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah! No, I wrote it down here: "Empress Leylas Kryn, 'umavi,' 600 years old." That's what I wrote down. I don't know what that means. But I put it in quotes, like that's what she's called, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 600 years old is what she's called?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: None of you guys have any idea of what consecuted refers to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We just have to ask somebody.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I also think that maybe getting a little preparation before we head deeper into this place might not be a terrible idea, and having a couple friends before we start--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, I'm all for charging ahead and leaving this town, but I just don't know what we're heading towards.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, in the short term, we need to learn how to ride those beasts. We could have-- Jester, you could check in with Yeza.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. I mean, the tasks she set for us are not super easy, I don't think.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Task one was to find a spy from the Empire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. There's some dickhead Empire person that's, like, a spy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Interesting.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And did they give you any leads?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nope. Oh, the Four Corners.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, she said that they were transmitting signals from the Four Corners-- or messages from the Four Corners. 5,000 gold if we find he or she alive. Then the other was to find more of those rifts, the source of them. Put it out, 10,000 gold. Or one super-hot favor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, the source of them could be in a whole other plane or dimension.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She seemed to think that it was here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This all sounds very time intensive. We should check in with your husband.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm a little interested in who the spy is. I mean, it could be a bit of a conflict of interest, because I feel like we're spies from the Empire.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't work for the Empire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (aggressively whispering) Shh. Don't say that! Shut up! Don't say that shit out loud.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, listen. We've got to go to rest for the evening anyway. There's only going to be three of us that are taking these seminar classes on how to ride the shadow panther maniacs, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think it might be wise for-- well, I don't know-- for everybody to learn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He was rolling perception.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you talking about?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (angry growling)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was speaking

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know what? Why don't we just take this out of the city for now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait. Leave the city to go to sleep?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because if we're coming back in to take seminar classes, maybe half the group could go check out the Four Corners.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck, that's a good point.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Otherwise, we're just sitting in daycare, you know what I mean?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's not a bad idea, actually. I'm not normally a fan of splitting people up, but that's clever.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go to sleep though, because it's been a really long day.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I am tired.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We are going to try and sleep in the city or outside the city?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, sir.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Make our way out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But we stop by Zorth's place and just let him know to keep hanging on to our little guys and we'll come and get them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, no worries! Just come on by whenever! They're right here waiting-- shut up! Beat 'em! "They'll be right here. I, er-- I've got to go! I'll see you later!" Heads on back to join the rest of the goblin crew that are-- it looks like one of them is starting to buck and get angry, and they're holding it down with ropes. It's going to be some interesting purchases. But you gather your things--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, we'll make our way outside the city.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's go camping.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You exit the city. You find yourself a comfortable place on the outskirts, which is not too hard. There are actually a number of tents on the outside of the city where some folks just don't have spaces inside Asarius to find home, or some folks that prefer to sleep out under the stars. There are a number of campsites ahead out there, especially over by where the large portion of the army is set. You can see a number of fires and light systems. The sun eventually crests for the day where all the soldiers are scattered and still preparing for whatever movement is ahead of them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to keep an eye on the skies for birds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They repel it, though you are not certain of the means or use. It runs the opposite way for about a quarter mile, and just stops and sits there. You watch and it slowly begins to mosey northward, away from the city.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No flashes? No lights? No--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Interesting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you bed down for the evening; gather your thoughts, gather your abilities, and think amongst yourselves what the next proper plan of action is before you're about to enter day two on the outskirts of the City of Beasts. And that's where we'll end tonight's session. Pick up there next week.

lines.name: TALIESIN, TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! City of Beasts!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Amazing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matt. So good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm excited. It's a very different vibe from where you started.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm a fan. I'm a fan!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's update that iPad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We need a new tablet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you do. We'll get everyone fixed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just start the updates now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, thank you guys for tuning in. Don't forget tomorrow, here at the Twitch channel at 7pm is our Search for Grog one-shot. Make sure to see that: 7pm Pacific.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Event of the season!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering) [music]
